title: FPS and MS
body: My ping used to be around 30-40 and now its at a solid 100.. its not my internet because i've reset it a couple times, anyone know why its like this?

replies.body:
Changes in latency (ping) are caused by issues either locally on your network or along your network routing to the servers. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure everything locally is up to spec.

If you still encounter issues after taking those steps, please let me know.
